title: indicator-sigma-rule
description: This extension adds new properties to Indicator SDOs to capture Sigma Rule specific data.

x_sigma_level.description: The level field contains one of five string values. It describes the criticality of a triggered rule.

x_sigma_status.description: Declares the status of the rule.

x_sigma_license.description: License of the rule according the SPDX ID specification.

x_sigma_falsepositives.description: A list of known false positives that may occur.
examples: Verify whether the user identity, user agent, and/or hostname should be making changes in your environment.

x_sigma_fields.description: A list of log fields that could be interesting in further analysis of the event and should be displayed to the analyst.

x_sigma_scope.description: A list of the intended scopes of the rule. This would allow you to define if a rule is meant to trigger on specific set of types of machines that might have a specific software installed.
